c06a7a72-385c-477d-aad6-7a7a84e6c1d0.Text: Melta weapon attacks gain the following bonuses: Base Damage Bonus: + Weapon's Maximum Damage bonus. Damage Bonus(%): +{uip|damagebonus|4fa4dbc023474337990840e305d06fa4}. Single-shot AP Cost: -1 AP (minimum 1). Critical hits do additional base damage equal to the current weapon's minimum damage bonus.

cabcbd5c-e59f-4e49-a001-4b6d54ea2e63.Text: Plasma weapon gain the following bonuses: Base Damage Bonus: +(Current weapon's maximum damage / 2) {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Damage{/g} Bonus %: +{uip|damagebonus|fdc990cb73114e4d8a7575813936cec9} Hit Chance Bonus %: +5. Critical Base Damage Bonus: + Current weapon's minimum damage / 2

9cdcd518-1127-47c2-8c5b-b5f85a3f8804.Text: Bolt weapon attacks gain the following bonuses: Base Damage Bonus: + Current weapon's maximum damage / 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Armour Penetration{/g} Bonus %: +{uip|penetrationbonus|72b608c024174a13b60b70675e4ca840} Damage Bonus %: +{uip|damagebonus|72b608c024174a13b60b70675e4ca840} Recoil:-25%. Hit Chance Bonus %: +5 Bleed Damage on Critical Hits: Current weapon's minimum damage

a8ffba14-8b42-4fd0-b8c2-43ccdfaf9184.Text: Flame weapon attacks gain the following bonuses: Weapon Attack {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} Cost: -1 AP (minimum 1) Max Distance Bonus: +4 Damage Bonus %: +{uip|damagebonus|30ef0b17c93444bb9b0a0169c6fffe06} Burning Damage Affliction: Current weapon's maximum damage + {uip|burnbonus|30ef0b17c93444bb9b0a0169c6fffe06}.

284cc94e-b4f2-478b-9967-721eb6144fa9.Text: Solid projectile weapon attacks gain the following bonuses: Base Damage Bonus: +(Current weapon's maximum damage / 2) Damage Bonus %: +{uip|damagebonus|21d6182a02014531a63f28fe5ff34530} Reload AP Cost: -2 AP (minimum 1) Fire Rate Bonus: +1 Bleed Damage on Critical Hits: Current weapon's minimum damage / 2 Hit Chance Bonus %: +5

8bd043c7-4aca-4315-81ae-ec25ee98913c.Text: The Sweep ability of an axe and the Shove ability of a hammer or mace cost −1 AP less (but no less than 1). Hammers and Mauls: Applies a random trauma if the target fails a Toughness test with a +25 bonus. Knives: Recover {unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} MP upon a successful hit and do +{unit_stat|WarhammerWeaponSkill}% damage on targets with less than 50% HP. Primitive Melee weapons: Gain base damage equal to the current weapon's maximum damage / 2 and +{uip|primitivedamagebonus|2558102cf3d24a52ae8be0f0e898dec1}% bonus damage. Blade weapons: Gain base damage equal to the current weapon's maximum damage / 2,+{uip|bladedamagebonus|2558102cf3d24a52ae8be0f0e898dec1}% critical damage, {uip|bladedodgebonus|2558102cf3d24a52ae8be0f0e898dec1}% dodge reduction, and +{uip|bladecritbonus|2558102cf3d24a52ae8be0f0e898dec1}% critical hit chance.

c7785b19-93a0-4a18-b39b-cc85c865de33.Text: Drukhari ranged weapons deal +{uip|damagebonus|505223dbfb2d4be6a758818c46878908}% increased damage for each DoT affecting the target and additional base damage equal to their maximum damage divided / 2. All DoT effects applied to a target are increased by +{uip|dotdamagebonus|505223dbfb2d4be6a758818c46878908}%. Drukhari Las Weapons gain separate bonuses from the ones above: Base Damage Bonus: + Weapon's maximum damage Damage Bonus %: +{uip|lasdamagebonus|505223dbfb2d4be6a758818c46878908}

5dc453dc-f0fe-4a1f-bae2-cc8358348a7f.Text:
Drukhari and Aeldari melee weapons damage scales with AGI instead of STR if its higher
They also do +{uip|critdamagebonus|ba334a21868849f1b198440d0eff98bc}% critical damage,additional base damage equal to their <u>max damage / 2</u>, {uip|dodgereduction|ba334a21868849f1b198440d0eff98bc}% dodge reduction, and +{uip|critbonus|ba334a21868849f1b198440d0eff98bc} critical hit chance.

b19a55bb-d66d-4fbd-aeaf-ab05085e8bb6.Text:
Aeldari ranged weapons deal +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} base critical damage and +{uip|critdamagebonus|d0313fe1cb894406a012329b2c46c48c}% critical damage.
Single-shot attacks gain +{uip|penetrationbonus|d0313fe1cb894406a012329b2c46c48c}% armor penetration.

74316417-b0df-4d28-9b5b-92ec943b7f92.Text: Force weapon attacks deal +{uip|DamageBonus|0618c379e430483bab1a17b2de559bc5} more base {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, +(25 + 3 × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psy Rating{/g})% damage, and have +{uip|ArmourPenetrationBonus|0618c379e430483bab1a17b2de559bc5}% more {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

411206e0-b73c-4dd5-b151-a3014ce1a7de.Text: Two single shots to one target. This attack has triple armor penetration and +9 range.

49a7578b-8885-4272-a20c-0ae6822214d8.Text: A shotgun attack that has {uip|Penetration|027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}% additional armour penetration, +50% damage, and applies {uip|Bleed|027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec} bleed to all targets hit.
